title: How do I practice tool?
body:
I'm on OCE. How do I use the practice tool? Is it under custom game?

Or am I to assume that OCE doesn't get the practice tool?

replies.body:
You can access the Practice Tool from the *Training* game mode type (top of screen) in the Beta Client after hitting the **Play** button.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
what level do you have to be to use it?
is it still available today? if yes how do i get beta client... plz?
